questions: Are you the person within who is responsible for developing or reviewing your company's approach to smoking in the workplace?
Does your company have a formal policy regarding smoking by employees in the workplace?
Is your company's smoking policy distributed to employees in writing?
What is your company's policy toward smoking?
Smoking is allowed throughout the company
Smoking is allowed in designated areas
Smoking is not allowed in company buildings at all
Smoking by employees is not allowed at any time
Employees can be fired for smoking either on or off the job
People who smoke are not hired
Smokers pay more for health insurance
